verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,-rāya, dekhile kamala-nayana?
rāya kahe-ebe yāi pāba daraśana

synonyms: prabhu kahe—the Lord said; rāya—My dear Rāmānanda Rāya; dekhile—have you seen; kamala-nayana—the lotus-eyed Lord Jagannātha; rāya kahe—Rāmānanda Rāya replied; ebe yāi—now I shall go; pāba daraśana—I shall visit the temple.
translation:
Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu next asked Rāmānanda Rāya, "Have you already visited the temple of the lotus-eyed Lord Jagannātha?"
 
Rāmānanda Rāya replied, "I shall now go visit the temple."
